udCFogretKeyText: Ваш профиль будет удален из контракта игры
wflBrMetanxtrateh: % of level's pot moved to the next level
wflBrMetaspltrateh: % of level's pot moved to split branch
wflBrMetastartjailedh: if true, player must pay Unjail fee to start
wflBrMetastkminh: lowest allowed staking amount for start/split branch
wflBrMetastkrateh: % of start pot of split branch need to become a stakeholder of this branch
wflBrMetatkintrvlh: time interval to wait until vested gain becomes available to the winner
wflBrMetatkrateh: % of winned pot to be taken as gain
wflBrMetaunjlintrvlh: time interval to wait until next turn allowed after enjailed (red cell)
wflBrMetaunjlminh: min. amount to be paid to stay in the current level (red cell)
wflBrMetaunjlrateh: % of current pot to be paid to stay (red cell). Can't be less than 'Min. unjail'
wflBrMetaurlh: detailed description and info on the rules set
wflBrMetawinnerrateh: % of level's revenue paid to the branch current winner
